tourBios.carHigh: 2015: After Monday Qualifying, finished T4 at the Syncrude Boreal Open...As one of the top three non-members on the Order of Merit through six events, earned conditional status for the remainder of the season.
tourBios.personal: Worked as a golf equipment representative from 2011-13...Lists playing a practice round with Nick Faldo at the 2010 BMW Open as his most thrilling moment in golf...Favourite food is schnitzel, and his favorite cities to visit are Kelowna, British Columbia and and Orlando, Fla...Twitter name is @christrunzer...Is a supporter of the Pennies From Heaven charity, affiliated with the Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T4th in 2015 at the The Syncrude Boreal Open Presented by AECON.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T79th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
